featured.text: Since that time humans have been going up and down the earth, digging, climbing, and exploring—searching for something already within themselves.
They canoed down rivers, hiked along muddy trails, and climbed into the forest to explore and learn.
Unconventional solutions can also be explored.
A team of scientists, teachers, and students, the AmazonQuest team, recently explored some of the wonders of the Amazon Rainforest.
This interesting phenomenon becomes a subject explored by many scientists.

Various studies have been _____ in this hospital to explore the link between a high-fat diet and cancer.

definition.zh_def: 探索；探險；仔細研究或調查某事物。
definition.en_def: To travel through an unfamiliar area to learn about it or to examine something in detail.
definition.example: We decided to explore the ancient ruins during our vacation.
